Skull.description: -1 (-3 instead if you have 3 or more horror on you).

Cultist.description: -4. If your location has at least 1 horror on it, take 1 horror (from the token pool). If your location has no horror on it, place 1 horror on it instead.

Tablet.description: -4. If your location has at least 1 horror on it, take 1 horror (from the token pool). If your location has no horror on it, place 1 horror on it instead.

Elder Thing.description: -4. If your location has at least 1 horror on it, take 1 horror (from the token pool). If your location has no horror on it, place 1 horror on it instead.

Skull.description: -X, where X is the amount of horror on you. (If you have no horror on you, X is 1).

Cultist.description: -5. If your location has at least 1 horror on it, take 1 horror (from the token pool). If your location has no horror on it, place 1 horror on it instead.

Tablet.description: -5. If your location has at least 1 horror on it, take 1 horror (from the token pool). If your location has no horror on it, place 1 horror on it instead.

Elder Thing.description: -5. If your location has at least 1 horror on it, take 1 horror (from the token pool). If your location has no horror on it, place 1 horror on it instead.
